channel.title: Where do I put the ::char command?

item.title: Where do I put the ::char command?
item.dc:creator: @MoparScapeHelp MoparScapeHelp
item.description:
@MoparScapeHelp wrote:

} else if (command.startsWith(“char”) && playerRights <= 441) {
showInterface(3559);
} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“frame35”)) {
outStream.createFrameVarSize(35);
outStream.writeByte(10);
outStream.writeByte(10);
outStream.writeByte(10);
outStream.writeByte(10);
This one works for me
Put this one also
} else if (command.startsWith(“char”) && playerRights <= 441) {
showInterface(3559);

item.description:
@Rasmux wrote:

also once here can u check me if I have it right.

else if(command.startsWith(“char”) && playerRights <= 441) {
showInterface(3559);
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“frame35”))
{
outStream.createFrameVarSize(35);
outStream.writeByte(10);
outStream.writeByte(10);
outStream.writeByte(10);
outStream.writeByte(10);
}
